thread.title: Fedora Infrastructure Status: There are scheduled downtimes in progress
thread.title_full: Fedora Infrastructure Status: There are scheduled downtimes in progress

title: Fedora Infrastructure Status: There are scheduled downtimes in progress
text: There are scheduled downtimes in progress (This page is manually updated with known outages) Fedora Wiki wiki Everything seems to be working. Fedora People people Everything seems to be working. Zodbot IRC bot zodbot Everything seems to be working. The Koji Buildsystem koji Everything seems to be working. Darkserver darkserver Everything seems to be working. Tagger tagger Everything seems to be working. Package Database pkgdb Everything seems to be working. Fedora pastebin service fedorapaste We are moving to Modern Paste! Blockerbugs blockerbugs Everything seems to be working. Badges badges Everything seems to be working. FedoraHosted.org Services fedorahosted Everything seems to be working. Mirror Manager mirrormanager Everything seems to be working. Koschei Continuous Integration koschei Everything seems to be working. Ipsilon authentication Everything seems to be working. Mirror List mirrorlist Everything seems to be working. Fedora Infrastructure Cloud cloud Everything seems to be working. Account System fas Everything seems to be working. Package maintainers git repositories pkgs Everything seems to be working. Fedora websites website Everything seems to be working. Documentation website docs Everything seems to be working. COPR Build System copr Everything seems to be working. Package Updates Manager bodhi Everything seems to be working. Ask Fedora ask Everything seems to be working. Fedora Packages App packages Everything seems to be working. FreeMedia freemedia Everything seems to be working. Fedora Messaging Bus fedmsg Everything seems to be working. Fedora elections elections Everything seems to be working. Mailing Lists mailinglists Everything seems to be working. Fedora Calendar fedocal Everything seems to be working. Kerberos krb Everything seems to be working.
